News.headline: Brian Parish Obituary
News.short_description: It is with great sadness that we have to advise that long-time supporter and former Vice-Chairman of Dagenham FC passed away yesterday aged 79 after a short illness.
News.description:
Brian was an avid supporter for over 40 years and after stepping down from the Committee of Dagenham FC was a vocal supporter of the merger and enjoyed bringing his children and then grandchildren to the games.

For the past 15 years he has had a seat just behind the home dugout and his jolly, friendly demeanour will be missed by everyone lucky enough to have known him.

Our sympathy, at this very sad time, is extended to his family and friends.
